channel.title: Text color and alignement in the text box
channel.description:
Hello,
I want to write a centered title with a blue color in the text box. Does any of you know how we can do this please ?
Thank you

item.title: Text color and alignement in the text box
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
The text box does not support alignment or background colour formatting. This would be a great feature if someone wants to implement this for dashboards though

Read full topic
item.source: Text color and alignement in the text box
